titles.title: A resolution honoring Edward W. Brooke, III, former United States Senator for the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, on the occasion of his 90th birthday.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/27/2009--Introduced. Acknowledges and honors the achievements and contributions made by Edward W. Brooke, III, during his distinguished career of public service to the United States. Congratulates and expresses best wishes to the former Senator from Massachusetts on the celebration of his 90th birthday.
